item.title: Blockchain: Smart Contract From Scratch
item.description:
ðŸ—£ Talk (in ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹) @ DevParty Together 2020 - slides.
In this talk, we show how to develop an Ethereum Smart Contract using Solidity and how to interact with it through a web application written in React.

item.title: How to start a Podcast
item.description:
ðŸ—£ Talk (in ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹) @ Dev Talks ItalianCoders - slides.
In this talk, we present how we started a podcast. We decided to held this talk because we wanted to share with other people the problems we faced when we started to produce a podcast. During the talk, we propose some solutions to those problems. This talk is held in italian.
